string.name: menu_filter_by_grow_zone
string.translation_description: The label for the menu item to filter the displayed plants by grow zone.

string.name: plant_detail_image_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the header / hero image that is show at the top of the plant detail screen.

string.name: my_garden_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'My garden' screen where the user can see the list of plants that have been added to their garden.

string.name: plant_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the plant list screen where the user can see a list of plants available to add to their garden.

string.name: available
string.translation_description: Text for the header of the plant list page indicating the available plants for users to choose from.

string.name: plant_details_title
string.translation_description: Title for the plant details screen where the user can see the details for a specific plant.

string.name: add_plant
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the Plant List to add plants to their empty garden.

string.name: added_plant_to_garden
string.translation_description: Confirmation text that is shown when a user adds a plant to their empty garden.

string.name: garden_empty
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on the 'My Garden' screen when no plants have been added to the user's garden

string.name: plant_date_header
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on each plant on the 'My Garden' screen which says the word Planted to show date of planting below

string.name: watered_date_header
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on each plant on the 'My Garden' screen which says the word Last Watered to show date of last watering below

string.name: menu_item_share_plant
string.translation_description: The label for the Share menu item

string.name: share_text_plant
string.translation_description: The default messaged used when sharing a plant on SNS, etc.

resources.string: Check out the %s plant in the Android Sunflower app

string.name: watering_needs_prefix
string.translation_description: Prefix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered. Used in combination with watering_needs_suffix.

item.translation_description: Suffix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered, singular. Used in combination with watering_needs_prefix: 'Watering needs: every day'.
Suffix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered, plural. Used in combination with watering_needs_prefix: 'Watering needs: every 8 days'.
Text indicating when the the plant should next be watered, singular. Used in conjunction with last watered date. 'May 24, 2018 - water tomorrow.'.
Text indicating when the the plant should next be watered, plural. Used in conjunction with last watered date. 'May 24, 2018 - water in 8 days.'.

string.name: a11y_plant_item_image
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for each of the plant images shown in the 'My garden' and 'Plant list' screens.
